thread.title: Michigan State's Magic Johnson statue vandalized with Michigan graffiti
thread.title_full: Michigan State's Magic Johnson statue vandalized with Michigan graffiti

title: Michigan State's Magic Johnson statue vandalized with Michigan graffiti
text:
Michigan State's Magic Johnson statue vandalized with Michigan graffiti FOX Sports 
Oct 15, 2015 at 11:36a ET + 
The statue of Magic Johnson stands outside Michigan State's Breslin Center Richard Barnes Updated Oct 15, 2015 at 11:46a ET 
This Saturday, undefeated Michigan State travels to Michigan for a clash of top-12 teams. Before the big game this weekend, some Wolverine fans allegedly made a trip to East Lansing to add fuel to the rivalry. 
The Magic Johnson statue outside Michigan State's Breslin Center was vandalized, among other places on campus. A yellow 'M' was graffitied on Johnson's jersey, while "Beat State" was written at the base of the statue. Here's a photo from Spartans junior guard Alvin Ellis III . true â€” Alvin Ellis (@AEllisIII) October 15, 2015 
The Spartans and Wolverines kick off from the Big House at 3:30 p.m. on Saturday.
